cause.description:
Duncan Hunter is by far the best candidate that will be running in 2008. He is a strong supporter of Israel, and also supports the war on terror. He has traditional, conservative values. A list of his principles can be seen at http://www.gohunter08.com/inner.asp?z=4
1. Duncan Hunter is the best candidate in the 2008 election
cause.mission: Promote Duncan Hunter for Presidency in 2008
cause.name: Duncan Hunter 2008
